Key Match Events: Gavin Lux homered and had a sacrifice fly as part of a bountiful night for the Dodgers' shorthanded offense
Will Smith recreated his division-clinching homer from two weeks ago by driving a fastball a projected 432 feet to center field
Lux turned on the first changeup he saw from Wandy Peralta for a home run, his first homer off a left-handed pitcher in 25 months
Tommy Edman grew the advantage in the seventh with a well-executed squeeze bunt up the first-base line
Pre-Game Insights: Freddie Freeman and his manager had breakfast and discussed Freeman's potential absence from the lineup due to injury
Freddie Freeman was scratched from the lineup just over an hour before first pitch, despite initial plans to play
Post-Match Reflections: Max Muncy said, 'every single guy in here went up to Freddie and said, 'Hey, we got you. Don't worry.'
Roberts said, 'When you get into the postseason, it's a street fight... It's about people, players, and your desire has got to be more than your opponent.'
Kiké Hernández said, 'To combine for a win, Edman said, was'resilience.'
Kiké Hernández said, 'I don't know what it says, honestly dude... We were very injured all year, somehow we had the best record in the league.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers' 8-0 victory in Game 4 gave them, and Freeman, another 48 hours to keep their season alive
The NLDS will go to a winner-take-all fifth game
The bottom five spots in the batting order combined to go 10-for-51 through the first three games of this series, but went 7-for-25 in Game 4
The Dodgers battered the underbelly of the Padres' vaunted bullpen, chasing Cease after just 38 pitches
Others: Freddie Freeman has been playing through a sprained right ankle, bone bruise in the foot, and side aches, requiring injections and treatment to start and finish games
Mookie Betts broke out of his mental funk with a first-inning homer, his second in as many nights
Shohei Ohtani and Betts expanded the lead to 3-0 an inning later
The Dodgers will face a winner-take-all Game 5 on Friday night
